ComicInfo.Summary: Continuing from the previous issue, this part 2 will leave you breathless. The Curse continues brutally decapitating Spawn as research material, until he eventually leaves spawn for a brief moment. This gives spawn an oppurtunity to perform a gruesome, and dearing escape. Now Spawn needs to take his vengeance against the religiously obsessed maniac, known as The Curse.
ComicInfo.Title: Fugitives 2
